challenges.name: Lost in the World
challenges.description: Every great orienteer has started out lost at some point. Each symbol you decipher is one less step in the wrong bush! Complete your first challenge!

challenges.name: Treasure Hunt
challenges.description:
Is that a tree or just a beefed-up bush? Are those power lines or just a giant clothesline?
And that 'X' must be a treasure... nope, just a picnic table :(

challenges.name: Black Hole
challenges.description: Huh. Is this black hole actually brown? The only mystery bigger than outer space is figuring out if that thing is a knoll or just a grumpy dirt bump.
